mapper.sql: video_id, video_title, video_introduction, cover_img, video_path, user_id, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select: select * from study_video where video_id NOT IN(select video_id from study_video_putoff) order by video_id
select video_id from study_video where video_path = #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into study_video (video_id, video_title, video_introduction, cover_img, video_path, user_id, createtime, updatetime) values (#{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

insert into study_video
video_id,
video_title,

video_path,

createtime,
updatetime,

mapper.update:
update study_video
video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_introduction = #{videoIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover_img = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_path = #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = now()
where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update study_video set video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_introduction = #{videoIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_img = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_path = #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now() where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
